p: SARS-CoV-2 has been detected in nasopharyngeal swabs and sputum samples from asymptomatic patients [ 11]. The viral load detected in asymptomatic individuals was similar to that of symptomatic patients suggesting that people without symptoms have a strong ability to transmit the virus to others [ 21].
